Title: Establishes a credit for military spouses and surviving spouses of veterans for competitive examinations
Summary: Establishes a credit for military spouses and surviving spouses of veterans for competitive examinations whether for original appointment or promotion.
LawCode: Amd ยง85, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the civil service law, in relation to providing a service credit to military spouses and to surviving spouses of veterans in competitive examinations
